Meet ICP (Internet Computer Protocol)

The DFINITY Foundation develops ICP and extends the functionality of the internet by allowing software and services to operate directly on the internet, bypassing traditional servers. This approach facilitates a new way of building and hosting applications aiming to improve data security and reduce costs by eliminating the need for central servers. ICP supports the deployment of smart contracts and decentralized applications (dApps), with governance by its community of token holders.

Learn more about ICP

By introducing ICP to our platform, we’re expanding our ongoing effort to support a broad and varied range of trading opportunities for our community.
